Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (DirectX 11 compatible GPU)

  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: FSR 3, FSR1 & FSRAA require an FSR-compatible GPU. DLSS 3.5 & DLAA need an NVIDIA RTX

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-7820HK
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX-1080

requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7-12700K (only high-end processor tested)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX-3090 / RTX-4070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Fully dynamic lighting requires high-end machine if goal is to play in 4K/60fps. Uses DLSS to enable wider range of viable graphics card options.
